title: InflationResult
description:
InflationResult is an XDR Union defines as:

```text union InflationResult switch (InflationResultCode code) { case INFLATION_SUCCESS: InflationPayout payouts<>; case INFLATION_NOT_TIME: void; }; ```

InflationPayout.description:
InflationPayout is an XDR Struct defines as:

```text struct InflationPayout // or use PaymentResultAtom to limit types? { AccountID destination; int64 amount; }; ```
